thread.title: Crash to desktop during initialising game
thread.title_full: Crash to desktop during initialising game

author: matty999 (invalid@example.com)
title: Crash to desktop during initialising game
text:
Hello,
The game recently keeps crashing during starting up the game, when it says 'initializing game' it stops after a few minutes and shuts down to desktop without an error message.
It hasnt always done this but i cant remember how long ago it started doing it. Other games like CK2 and EU4 still work fine.
Also i have looked at fixing this problem and taken a few steps already from the recommendations seen on other threads with the same issue.
So far i have;
Uninstalled and reinstalled more than once each time making sure to delete all local files in documents and steam files
verified game files after each fresh install
Disabled all mods in the launcher
Tried launching on previous game version
Checked my firewall allows CK3
Tried ticking disable fullscreen optimisation and in the launcher then selected full screen display mode, vsync off, refresh cap rate 60
checked for latest drive updates
updated my windows to newest update
After all these things didn't make a difference i tried changing the page file size , i think my laptop has 4gb of ram so i changed it to 8gb size values.
The crash still occurs at the same time.
Their is nothing in the system or exemptions logs but i have attached the other 3 below.
Thanks
